profile.bio: Christian, Husband, Technopreneur, Trini. Sr. Software Engineer @Rocketmiles, Co-founder @WeDelivr (Acq). @Techstars Chicago 2014. @StartupWeekend organizer. All-around technologist and entrepreneur with moxie.
